full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GIS BZLOG BSGYUR BYA TSUL 'GAL RKYEN BZLOG BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (ZHES 'DI NI CHOS SKYONG SRING GI RTZA BRGYUD KYI GZHUNG LAS LEN PA 'DI NI SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, @008A *, ,DE LAS CHUNG RGYAS NAS BGYIS PA ZHES, ,AER TE NI TZAS SNG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI LTA BU'I DGOS NAN TAN GYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGO MA CHOG PAR ^ SKYABS GNAS DAM PA DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, BYUNG RGYAL DU SONG BA'I BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYI BRIS PA LA LHAG CHAD LA SOGS PA'I NYES SKYON THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA DANG CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS KYIS THUGS BRTZE BA'I BZOR PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DES BDAG SOGS 'GRO KUN DES NAS BYANG CHUB MA THOB KYI BAR DU DU LAM BZANG GI RKYEN NGAN BAR CHAD KUN BZLOG PA'I MTHUN RKYEN BSGRUB PA'I STONG GROGS PAR MDZAD DU GSOL,, ,,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
